about_the_game:
Time Travel Book

This Time Travel Book adds 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Travel through the ages in this book. Go all the back to Prehistory and forward to the unknown future, stopping along the way at some of the most memorable era's!

Contents

The Time Travel book unlocks the following images:
  • 1960's - 52x54
  • Millennium - 67x71
  • Cell Life - 73x107
  • 1980's Retro - 100x100
  • Extinction - 100x100
  • Medieval - 110x85
  • Industrial Revolution - 129x81
  • Ancient Greece - 150 x 105
  • 1920's - 170x228
  • American Frontier - 175x75
  • Ancient Egypt - 176x108
  • Stone Age - 190x100
  • Classical History - 192x108
  • Future - 192x108
  • Before Life - 220x170
  • Cambrian Era - 250x280
  • Feudal Japan - 267x180
  • Renaissance - 270x350
  • Ice Age - 288x101
  • Evolution - 317x146

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Time Travel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
